definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: However, features for the later evolutions would require mostly new code.
sentences.chinese: 然而，对于后面的演进的特性将主要需要新的代码。

sentences.english: It is throughout the maintenance phase that the software evolves the most.
sentences.chinese: 软件的演进主要发生在整个维护阶段。

sentences.english: It shows three evolutions for this project, using cylinders to represent iterations.
sentences.chinese: 它显示了该项目的三个演进，用圆柱来表示迭代。

sentences.english: It can even describe how industry structures evolve.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至能描述产业结构是如何演进的。

sentences.english: Incentive-compatible regulation is an inevitable trend in the progress of international banking regulation.
sentences.chinese: 激励相容监管是国际银行业监管演进必然趋势。

sentences.english: Agile and transparent optical network is one of the significant directions for the evolution of Optical Transport Network (OTN).
sentences.chinese: 灵活透明光网络是传送网的发展演进方向之一。

sentences.english: Then the author points out the Lunan Economic Belt's strategic position in Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分详细阐述了鲁南经济带城镇体系的演进历程。

sentences.english: How do we handle evolution of DSL meta-models and models?
sentences.chinese: 如何处理DSL元模型及模型的演进？

sentences.english: Generally speaking, the evolution of constitution can be summed up in two aspects:the pattern of amendment and the pattern of interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 大体说来，宪法演进分为修改模式和解释模式两种。

sentences.english: Note that each cylinder is contained within a spiral that represents an evolution.
sentences.chinese: 注意到每个圆柱都包含于表示演进的螺旋中。

sentences.english: Photo manipulation is an ever evolving collaboration between photography and graphic design.
sentences.chinese: 照片处理是摄影与平面设计两者不断演进的合作结晶。

sentences.english: There is a course from requisition-compensation balance of cultivated land to overprotection.
sentences.chinese: 耕地从占补平衡到超额保护经历了一个演进过程。

sentences.english: It is the first time it has got to this stage with these type of bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 这是首次让此类细菌演进到这种阶段。

sentences.english: It would be a natural evolution of microelectronics to become nanoelectronics.
sentences.chinese: 它是从微电子学到奈米电子学的自然演进。

sentences.english: Enterprise accounting organization has the internal connection with optimizing company governability.
sentences.chinese: 企业会计组织演进与优化公司治理具有内在联系。

definition: to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
